## `jsx-a11y no autoFocus`

```

  ✖ Avoid the autoFocus attribute.

    <input autoFocus />
           ^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Automatically focusing elements overrides natural page content focus order, causing issues for
    keyboard-only navigation.

  ℹ Recommended fix

  - autoFocus
  + <input·/>
```
